name: 蕭耀榮
objective:
線性空間分析，狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性，穩定性分析，狀態回授及估測，控制器設計及應用，觀測器設計及應用，非線性系統，時變系統，控制理論的應用

In the 2012 Fall semester, this course is instructed in English.
Topics of this course will cover state space, system response, controllability and observability, stability, system feedback and estimation, controller design and application, observer design, etc.
